original_text: But instead, you are happy and you dance! You kill cows and sheep for a feast! You eat lots of meat and you drink lots of wine. You say, ‘We will have a big feast today, because tomorrow we will be dead!’
korean_text: 너희가 기뻐하며 즐거워하여 소를 죽이고 양을 잡아 고기를 먹고 포도주를 마시면서 내일 죽으리니 먹고 마시자 하는도다

sentences.original_text: You kill cows and sheep for a feast!
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 잔치를 위해 소와 양을 잡는다!

sentences.original_text: and you drink lots of wine.
You say, 'We will have a big feast today,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 말한다, '우리는 오늘 큰 잔치를 할 것이라,

sentences.original_text: because tomorrow we will be dead!'
